result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brian L Mallam

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: for Termination from Drug & Alcohol Court
Status hrg or plea on August 25, 2014 at 11:00 am.
copy of competency eval report to both atty's
Status conference on August 5, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant, Brian L Mallam appeared with Attorney Chris A Gramstrup.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State.  Also has 13 CM 213, 14 CF 18, 14 CF 37, 14 CF 48 and 14 CF 52.  9:25 AM Court calls cases and appearances.  Atty Gramstrup makes stmt - raises the issue of competency to assist.  Court will order custodial evaluation by Dr. Minter.  If trial in Sawyer is not resolved this case to be rescheduled.  Status conference scheduled for August 5, 2014 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on June 23, 2014 at 09:15 am.

Defendant, Brian L Mallam appeared with Attorney Chris A Gramstrup.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State. Court calls case and appearances, also has 14CF17, 14CF18, 14CF37, 14CF48, 14CF52.  Atty Gramstrup speaks to the court and requests a reset with status.  Bail will continue.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2014 at 09:15 am.
Status conference on June 2, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Brian L Mallam in court with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  Defendant Brian L Mallam in custody.  Thomas Henry Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Gramstrump waived reading entered not guilty plea.   State requests $1000.00 with no contact provisions.  Court bail has been set and will continue.  Status conference scheduled for June 2, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Brian L Mallam in court with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  Defendant Brian L Mallam in custody.  Thomas Henry Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 13 CM 213, 14 CF 17 and 14 CF 37.  Atty Gramstrup waived reading as to 14 CF 48 and waived right to prelim.  Court addressed the defendant re: his right to a prelim.  Defendant does not wish to have a prelim.  Court finds defendant has freely waived his right to a preliminary exam.  Finds probable cause and binds the defendant over for trial.   Recess 20 minutes

No contact with S.M., her children and her residence.  No contact with Ms. S.  No alcohol.  Absolute sobriety.  Not to consume any controlled substances unless prescribed by a licensed physician.  No contact with L. and A. E. and their residence.
